verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%> on Neginoth <S%H5058><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> or Song <S%H7892><s%>. 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> be merciful <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto us, and bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> us; and cause his face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon us; Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
That thy way <S%H1870><s%> may be known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8800><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>, thy saving health <S%H3444><s%> among all nations <S%H1471><s%>.
Let the people <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; let all the people <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee.

O let the nations <S%H3816><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and sing for joy <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8762><s%>: for thou shalt judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> righteously <S%H4334><s%>, and govern <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the nations <S%H3816><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
Let the people <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; let all the people <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee.

Then shall the earth <S%H776><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her increase <S%H2981><s%>; and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, even our own 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, shall bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> us.
'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> us; and all the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him.
